verses.roman:
sarvathā śaraṇāpatti, kārtikādi-vrata
'catuḥ-ṣaṣṭi aṅga' ei parama-mahattva

synonyms: sarvathā—in all respects; śaraṇa-āpatti—surrender; kārtika-ādi-vrata—to observe special vows in the month of Kārttika; catuḥ-ṣaṣṭi aṅga—sixty-four parts; ei—this; parama-mahattva—very important items.
translation: "Thirty-four: One should surrender to Kṛṣṇa in all respects. (35) One should observe particular vows like kārtika-vrata. These are some of the sixty-four important items of devotional service.
